name: jtd-ts
description: The converter from JTD to TypeScript interfaces and validators.

scripts.build: set -e; tsc; npm run rollup; npm run terser
scripts.rollup: for p in ./lib/index.js ./lib/validator/runtime.js; do rollup --external json-pointer --exports auto --input $p --file ${p%.js}-cjs.js --format cjs --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve --plugin @rollup/plugin-commonjs; done
scripts.terser: for p in ./lib/index-cjs.js ./lib/validator/runtime-cjs.js; do terser --compress --mangle toplevel --output $p -- $p; done

author: Savva Mikhalevski <smikhalevski@gmail.com>
